summary:
I am David Chege, originating from Nakuru, a distinguished county in Kenya. I hold the third position among my four siblings, sharing this unique space with two sisters and a brother. Beyond my unwavering ardor for coding, I ardently collect music, crafting a harmonious ambiance that gracefully envelops my coding odysseys at a subdued volume. In addition to these pursuits, I indulge in the art of gardening and commit to sporadic home workouts, nurturing my holistic well-being.
At this juncture, I am earnestly pursuing opportunities in the dynamic domain of web development, fervently embarking on the next chapter of my professional odyssey.

education.title: education
education.summary: I embarked on my journey as a self-taught developer, driven by unbridled passion. Armed with Free Code Camp, YouTube (like Web Dev Simplified), and HackerRank, I've honed my skills. My hobby transformed into a career pursuit in October 2022. Laravel and React became my tools, and I'm now delving into React.js. Explore my GitHub for a glimpse of my work!
